channel.title: What is the strongest reason you join a server?
channel.description:
i wanna make my server better and i need to know what people are interested in plz post:)
reason till now(the things i heard in this post) -castle wars -barrows -hard cash -slow leveling -good pk areas -Rares are Rares -it needs specials fully working -skillcapes which only 2 servers have so far (real runescape ones) -rares are rares -lvling is not to fast not to slow -not too many mods/admins -no-ip so lots of people can join -no lag wat so ever

item.title: What is the strongest reason you join a server?
item.dc:creator: @Edge-PKz Edge-PKz
item.description:
@Edge-PKz wrote:

Defenders + Pest-Control + Real rs Interfaces + Like Real RS(Member) etc.

Read full topic

item.title: What is the strongest reason you join a server?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Hmmm i fi would join a good server
-it needs specials fully working
-skillcapes which only 2 servers have so far (real runescape ones)
-rares are rares
-lvling is not to fast not to slow
-not too many mods/admins
-no-ip so lots of people can join
-no lag wat so ever

Read full topic

@I_Forca_I wrote:

Hmm my reasons to join would be:

  • Slow Leveling
  • Rares are Rare
  • Good Pk Area

item.source: What is the strongest reason you join a server?

item.title: What is the strongest reason you join a server?
item.dc:creator: @invalid_name1 invalid name
item.description:
@invalid_name1 wrote:

No, don't listen to him.. Look at all the big servers. zDiddyScape, Pk Desert ect.. They all have slow leveling, so when you do get that 99 str or range it actually means something.. Again make cash hard, and make rares actually rares, by taking out the rare shops.. GoodLuck ~Ashley.

lol i agree too, but my server is like that but i only get like 1 - 3 people playing a day :o must mean my server is realy bad lol but anyway, i prefer servers with hard stuff to get and kinda slow leveling.

GL S W A T.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the strongest reason you join a server?

item.title: What is the strongest reason you join a server?
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:5, topic:103330”][quote author=Ruvio link=topic=147879.msg1405866#msg1405866 date=1180648595]
easy cash
fast leveling
good pk areas
not 1000’s of places to go, just like 3
[/quote]

No, don’t listen to him… Look at all the big servers.
zDiddyScape, Pk Desert ect… They all have slow leveling, so when you do get that 99 str or range it actually means something… Again make cash hard, and make rares actually rares, by taking out the rare shops… GoodLuck ~Ashley.[/quote]

ok thanks

Read full topic
